name: Abundance Sigil Spell
description:
A sigil is a powerful symbol that holds an intention. When you cast a sigil spell, you are launching that intention into the world.

This sigil will bring abundance into your life. Here's how it works.
1. Collect this sigil
2. Find a quiet time to meditate with the sigil. Think about what it means to enjoy abundance for yourself and to give it others. Get specific about what it genuinely means to give and receive. 
3. Sell this sigil or gift it to another collector to complete your portion of the spell. The more people the sigil passes through the more abundance it generates for us all.
